title: Jio network issue, EC Campus
content: Is it just me or is jio not working properly is EC Campus and Hostel. A week ago it was fine, but since the past 3-4 days, it's messed up for some reason.

comments.body: Same here, Jio's not working. I spent ages trying to make a GPay transaction, walking all over the place trying to get some data and the canteen guy kept glaring suspiciously.
I swear! Can't use the PES wifi peacefully either. Forced to go home and work on labs and projects :'(
